### OHLC



#### LOAD DATA

```{r, echo=FALSE}



df = read.csv("../archetypes/aapl-2.csv", header = TRUE)
df <- tail(df, 87)
df


```

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10.5, fig.height=10.5}

fig <- df %>% plot_ly(x = ~Date, type="ohlc",
                      open = ~Open, close = ~Close,
                      high = ~High, low = ~Low) 
fig <- fig %>% layout(title = "Apple OHLC Chart",
                      xaxis = list(rangeslider = list(visible = F)),yaxis = list(
        tickformat = "$"
  ))

fig
```
